categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Aloeek the Voracious was a male Zabrak Sith living during or after the Cold War.

Aloeek the Voracious was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever the dark side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Aloeek the Voracious has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Hoth alongside other Dark Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine when his death took place.
